/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear day. The sun, high in the sky, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street is lined with trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The perspective of the image is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, from the lush green of the trees to the muted tones of the buildings and cars. The image is a snapshot of urban life, a moment frozen in time on a sunny day in the city.
